Product Id: Monthly Retail Trade Survey (Department Store Organizations)
This CANSIM table replaces archived table 80-0024.
Data for this Canadian industry are presented in unadjusted form as there is no seasonal pattern established by official statistics yet.

CANSIM Id: On April 26th, 2019, data for the Cannabis Stores Series were corrected for the province of Ontario for reference period of October 2018.

On December 24th, 2018, data for both the Retail sales, chained Fisher price index (2012) and Retail sales at 2012 prices (chained Fisher index) series were corrected for April 2018 through October 2018.
